title: Breaking barriers
creator_credit: John Sexton Productions, New South Wales. Anti-Discrimination Board and New South Wales Film Corporation
brief_description: A look at your rights under the New South Wales Anti-Discrimination Act, 1977 where “equal opportunity” should be given to all and no discrimination should exist on the grounds of race, sex or marital status.
creator_credit_for_label: John Sexton Productions, New South Wales. Anti-Discrimination Board and New South Wales Film Corporation
